strengths: Strong lead performances with good chemistry
Fresh take on terminal illness romance trope
inconsistencies_highlighted: Hand hygiene emphasized in one scene but ignored in others
Poe’s underdeveloped character leads to lack of emotional impact upon death
Unrealistic final scene in the park
Will's decision to leave Stella felt forced and unnecessary
Insensitive joke about sex in the Vatican

symbolism_and_art.comment: Use of visual metaphors and character art adds depth to the storytelling
symbolism_and_art.reviewer_impression: Appreciated the rooms and visual symbolism

tone_and_style.style_comparison: Comparable to 'The Fault in Our Stars' with a modern twist

verdict.summary: Better than expected with emotional payoff, despite predictable and implausible moments
verdict.recommendation: Worth a watch in theater or via streaming
